title: WTB or WTTF T206 Cobb Bat off Shoulder
author: Archive

posts.post_title: WTB or WTTF T206 Cobb Bat off Shoulder
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric
I'm looking to acquire a T206 Ty Cobb (Bat Off Shoulder) in a PSA 1 - 3 or SGC 10 - 40 with great eye appeal.

I'd like to either purchase if the price is right (by check, MO, or Paypal), trade for it, or do a cash/trade combo.

If you have one available, please email me at: crazylocomerk@yahoo.com
with your asking price and scans of the front/back.

Would love to do a trade or trade/cash combo if possible.  



Thank you.
